text: One, if you attack my integrity, I will defend myself. If you attack my patriotism, I will defend myself. If you come after my family, I will counter-attack viciously, I will destroy you.
author: Scott Ritter

text: During times of war, hatred becomes quite respectable even though it has to masquerade often under the guise of patriotism.
author: Howard Thurman

text: Patriotism is an ephemeral motive that scarcely ever outlasts the particular threat to society that aroused it.
author: Denis Diderot

text: Patriotism is best exemplified through auto-critique. When you're willing to stand up within the group and say, 'It is wrong for Black people to be anti-Semitic,' or 'It is wrong for America to discriminate against persons of African descent and made them slaves and based its wealth upon free labor,' it's crucial to say that.
author: Henry Louis Gates
